episodes.description: Kyoto was once the capital of Japan called Heian-kyo. Duan Wenning experiences junihitoe, the Heian-style robe and tries to take a selfie that will record her experience of traveling into the past.
episodes.title: Selfie Japan! Kyoto

episodes.description: We visit Tokushima Prefecture in Shikoku. In Iya, we cross a bridge made of vines. In the countryside, we take selfies with scarecrows. The figures show the hospitality of their creator.
episodes.title: Selfie Japan!

episodes.description: We visit Kochi Prefecture in Shikoku. The Niyodo River there has one of Japan's purest water qualities. We take photos underwater. We also take selfies where the water is called "Niyodo Blue."
episodes.title: Selfie Japan!
